alert.note: Alert for Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 3:27AM CDT until April 16 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Plaquemines Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 326 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Buras-triumph, or 14 miles southeast of Port Sulphur, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Boothville-venice, Boothville, Empire, Buras, Buras-triumph, Venice and Boothville Asos. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
